title: Nan Hanchen
text: Nan Hanchen (; 1895 – January 27, 1967) was the first governor of the <a href="People%27s%20Bank%20of%20China">People's Bank of China</a> (1949–1954). He was born in <a href="Hongdong%20County">Hongdong County</a>, <a href="Linfen">Linfen</a>, <a href="Shanxi">Shanxi</a> Province. He died during the <a href="Cultural%20Revolution">Cultural Revolution</a>. He was a delegate to the <a href="1st%20National%20People%27s%20Congress">1st National People's Congress</a>, <a href="2nd%20National%20People%27s%20Congress">2nd National People's Congress</a> and <a href="3rd%20National%20People%27s%20Congress">3rd National People's Congress</a>.
